sqlMap.select: SELECT BIN_OrganizationID AS departId, DepartCode AS departCode, Type AS departType, ISNULL(TestType,'0') AS testType, Level AS level, ValidFlag AS orgValid, DepartName AS departName FROM Basis.BIN_Organization WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# ORDER BY Path

SELECT A.BIN_OrganizationID AS departId FROM Privilege.BIN_DepartPrivilege A WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE A.BIN_UserID = #userId# AND (A.BusinessType = 'A' OR A.BusinessType = #businessType#) AND A.ValidFlag = '1' ORDER BY A.BIN_OrganizationID

SELECT A.BIN_ChannelID AS channelId
,ISNULL(A.ChannelNameForeign,A.ChannelName) AS channelName
,A.ChannelName AS channelName
,A.ChannelName AS channelName
FROM Basis.BIN_Channel A WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND A.ValidFlag = '1' ORDER BY A.ChannelName

SELECT DISTINCT TOP $number$ E.BIN_DepotInfoID AS depotId, E.DepotCode AS depotCode
,E.DepotNameEN AS depotName
,E.DepotNameCN AS depotName
,E.DepotNameCN AS depotName
FROM Basis.BIN_InventoryInfo A WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN Privilege.BIN_DepartPrivilege B WITH(NOLOCK) ON(A.BIN_OrganizationID=B.BIN_OrganizationID AND B.BIN_UserID = #userId# AND (B.BusinessType = 'A' OR B.BusinessType = #businessType#)) JOIN Basis.BIN_DepotInfo E WITH(NOLOCK) ON(A.BIN_InventoryInfoID = E.BIN_DepotInfoID AND E.TestType = #testType# AND E.ValidFlag = '1') WHERE A.ValidFlag = '1'
(E.DepotCode Like '%' + #depotInfoStr# + '%'
E.DepotNameCN Like '%' + #depotInfoStr# + '%'
E.DepotNameEN Like '%' + #depotInfoStr# + '%'
E.DepotNameCN Like '%' + #depotInfoStr# + '%'
)

,A.NameForeign AS departName
,A.DepartName AS departName
,A.DepartName AS departName
FROM Basis.BIN_Organization A WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN Privilege.BIN_DepartPrivilege B WITH(NOLOCK) ON(A.BIN_OrganizationID = B.BIN_OrganizationID AND B.BIN_UserID = #userId# AND (B.BusinessType = 'A' OR B.BusinessType = #businessType#))
JOIN Basis.BIN_CounterInfo C WITH(NOLOCK) ON(A.BIN_OrganizationID = C.BIN_OrganizationID and C.BIN_ChannelID = #channelId#)
JOIN Privilege.BIN_DepartRelation C99 WITH(NOLOCK) ON(A.BIN_OrganizationID = C99.BIN_OrganizationIDRel AND C99.BIN_OrganizationID = #departId#)
WHERE A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND A.TestType = #testType#

A.BIN_RegionID = #regionId#
A.BIN_ProvinceID = #provinceId#
A.BIN_CityID = #cityId#
A.BIN_CountyID = #countyId#
A.ValidFlag IN('1','0')
A.ValidFlag = '1'
A.ValidFlag = '1'
(A.ValidFlag=#orgValid# OR A.ValidFlag = '0')
A.ValidFlag = #orgValid#
A.ValidFlag = #orgValid#
(A.DepartCode Like '%' + #departInfoStr# + '%'
A.DepartName Like '%' + #departInfoStr# + '%'
A.NameForeign Like '%' + #departInfoStr# + '%'
A.DepartName Like '%' + #departInfoStr# + '%'
)
ORDER BY A.DepartCode
